searchQueries.title: Wine Search Queries
searchQueries.description: List of wine names to search for (e.g., 'Chateau Margaux', 'Opus One')

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Specific Wine-Searcher URLs to scrape (optional, alternative to search queries)

vintage.title: Vintage
vintage.description: Specific vintage year (e.g., '2015') or '-' for all vintages

country.title: Country
country.description: Country code for prices (us, uk, fr, de, etc.)

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of wines to scrape per search query (0 for unlimited)

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Number of parallel browsers (lower = more stealthy, recommended: 3-5)
